author: stsp
msg: (erase_from_wc): Use svn_error_return instead of SVN_ERR since we
already know there is an error. Also drop useless 'else'.

author: stsp
msg: Follow-up to r39396: Plug a potential error leak.

author: stsp
msg: Follow-up to r39481: Fix schedule test 8.
(erase_from_wc): When determining whether a directory is absent,
check for ENOENT as well as ENOTDIR. And don't leak an error if
the error code is neither ENOTDIR nor ENOENT.

author: stsp
msg: (make_conflict_versions): New helper, with code factored out from ...
(make_tree_conflict): ... this function, which now uses the helper.
(merge_file_changed): Use svn_wc_merge4(), using the new helper
function to construct the left and right conflict version info objects.

author: stsp
msg: A lot, but not all, deprecation warnings are fixed, and it brings some
more WC-NG goodness into this file, too.
